summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on September 24, 2004. It includes information about discounts applied, total charges, and shipment details, including the sender and recipient addresses.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is listed as the sender in the FedEx shipment details.

persons.name: Johnny Crampi
persons.context: Johnny Crampi is mentioned as the recipient of the FedEx shipment.

persons.name: S. Berry
persons.context: S. Berry is noted as the person who signed for the delivery.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Drop-off
events.description: A FedEx shipment was dropped off on September 21, 2004.

events.title: FedEx Delivery
events.description: The FedEx shipment was delivered on September 22, 2004, at 10:15 AM.

locations: 1075 W Georgia St, Vancouver, BC V6E 3C9, Canada
keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-639-09197, dated September 24, 2004.
Total charges for the FedEx services amount to $21.42 after discounts.
The shipment was dropped off on September 21, 2004, and delivered on September 22, 2004.
Darren Indyke is identified as the sender, while Johnny Crampi is the recipient.
S. Berry signed for the delivery of the package.
